snippet: The Episcopal Church voted to approve the use of an official liturgy to bless same-sex couples, called “The Witnessing and Blessing of a Lifelong Covenant.”
abstract: Text of the official liturgy approved by the Episcopal Church to bless same-sex couples, called The Witnessing and Blessing of a Lifelong Covenant.
lead_paragraph: The Episcopal Church voted to approve the use of an official liturgy to bless same-sex couples, called “The Witnessing and Blessing of a Lifelong Covenant.”

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
